name: Accelerating
description: Speeds up production or service delivery to meet required business needs.
awareness_level_1: Gives examples of how accelerating is used within own organization. Describes the organization's preferred process to speed up production and meeting business needs. Identifies tasks or outputs that require efficient production.
skilled_level_2: Identifies a project that would benefit from being accelerated and describes an approach for achieving this. Builds, with guidance, plans for effectively speeding up production and service delivery. Creates project/production guidelines for colleagues to follow to ensure business needs are met.
advanced_level_3: Coaches colleagues to enhance their ability to effectively and efficiently meet deadlines. Demonstrates in-depth knowledge of organization's policies and practices regarding eliminating delay and speeding up processes. Ensures others understand the critical elements of effective planning, reaching goals and efficient service delivery/production.
expert_level_4: Leads the organization in eliminating delay and speeding up service delivery/production to its competitive advantage. Champions the use of effective planning, reaching goals and efficient service delivery/production for tactical and strategic decisions. Monitors the organization's production and service delivery, and suggests process changes to accelerate outputs.

name: Accountability
description: Takes responsibility for one's actions regardless of outcomes. Feels accountable for the quality and timeliness of an outcome or task.
awareness_level_1: Explains the importance of accountability in own business area. Gives examples of how responsibility and accountability is used within own organization. Describes tactics for monitoring daily outcomes and tasks.
skilled_level_2: Demonstrates responsibility for one's actions. Builds, with guidance, task and outcome planning, for reaching goals on time. Assists in preparing individual and team quality standards.
advanced_level_3: Coaches colleagues in taking responsibility for their own actions. Demonstrates in-depth knowledge of organization's policies and practices regarding individual and team quality and timeliness standards. Ensures others understand the critical elements of improving individual and team accountability.
expert_level_4: Leads the organization to leverage accountability to its competitive advantage. Contributes to developing processes and policies for identifying accountability in individuals and teams. Champions the use of accountability and responsibility for task and outcome planning.

name: Achieving
description: Strives to exceed others' performance. Evaluates own performance in comparison to others. Prefers a competitive goal-oriented environment.
awareness_level_1: List the qualities associated with being competitive. Describes the organization's preferred process for monitoring goal achievement and performance. Lists the pros and cons of being highly goal-oriented.
skilled_level_2: Uses goal-directed behavior to set and reach goals. Explains how competition can be an effective motivator. Outlines the positive outcomes of collaborating to reach goals.
advanced_level_3: Fosters an environment with healthy competition and a focus on positive outcomes. Coaches others to set goals and improve performance. Has in depth experience in collaborating to reach shared goals.
expert_level_4: Champions healthy competition to reach personal and organizational goals. Contributes to plans and policies regarding monitoring goal setting and goal achievement. Leads the organization to leverage collaboration to its competitive advantage.

name: Action Orientated
description: Demonstrates the personal drive to achieve results that deliver value-added contributions and a positive impact on the organizations success metrics.
awareness_level_1: Gives examples of how personal drive can add value to the organization. Lists essential elements of being action oriented. Regularly sets and reviews goals/activities.
skilled_level_2: Uses personal drive practices to reach goals and obtain results. Explains how swift, decisive action adds value and improves an organization's success metrics. Uses scheduling to complete high value goals and activities.
advanced_level_3: Ensures others understand the critical elements of being action oriented. Coaches colleagues in setting goals and obtaining results. Demonstrates in-depth knowledge of organization's policies and practices regarding success metrics.
expert_level_4: Leads the organization to leverage personal drive to its competitive advantage. Champions the use of setting goals and obtaining results for tactical and strategic decisions. Designs processes for measuring value added contributions.

name: Advising
description: Provides information or giving advice to support decision making or action. Offers suggestions on the best course of action to take.
awareness_level_1: Describes how providing information and offering alternatives can influence making decision. Explains the importance of offering suggestions on the best course of action to take to Team Members. Gives examples of how providing guidance has been role modelled by someone in the organization.
skilled_level_2: Determines how providing alternative information and suggestions can be used in decision making. Gives and receives constructive feedback to support and improve others decision making. Takes the best course of action to identifying problems and offering alternatives.
advanced_level_3: Ensures others understand the critical elements of providing information and offering alternatives for making effective decisions. Coaches colleagues on how to give and receive constructive feedback to improve the effectiveness of decisions. Demonstrates in-depth experience providing guidance and making decisions.
expert_level_4: Champions the use of problem identification and coming up with alternate solutions. Leverages exploring all alternatives and taking the best course of action. Designs decision-making models and frameworks.
